post:
Celebrate Black Friday in March with Awesome Dedi Offers from Reprise Hosting! (From $27.97/mo in Seattle!)

dedi, dedicated server, exclusive, reprise hosting, seattle March 15, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

If you were luck and quick off the draw, you got in on Reprise Hosting‘s Black Friday offer last November.  If not…rejoice!  Because Brian from Reprise contacted us to say he wanted to roll out a special Black Friday in March set of specials for LEB readers!

  • You can get a 16GB L5640 (6c/12t) with 1TB of disk and 10TB of bandwidth for $27.97/mo!
  • Or get its big brother (32GB L5640 12c/12t, 1TB/10TB) for only $34.97/mo!
  • Offers for E5s starting at $31.47/mo!

However, supplies are limited to the first 15 customers, so don’t hesistate!

Reprise Hosting is registered in Delaware (file number 6186230). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal, Credit Card, Alipay, and Bitcoin.

Here’s a little about Reprise Hosting in their own words:

“For the past decade, Reprise Hosting has been a leader in the self-managed cheap dedicated servers space. We offer servers with robust hardware, a strong network and proven uptime/reliability. We provide straightforward honest service. In our nearly 10 years of business, we have never increased our rates or hiked prices on our customers. We post our third-party uptime stats publicly going back to 2013. We are based out of Seattle, WA, USA in the Westin Building Exchange — one the largest telecommunications hubs in the world. Our network is a redundant blend of NTT, Zayo, Telia and HE plus direct peering with Microsoft, Google, Amazon, IBM Cloud, Netflix, Akamai, Charter, T-Mobile, Telus, OVH, CloudFlare, Yahoo, Facebook, Twitter, Internap, Valve, Twitch, SK Broadband, SpaceX Starlink, Telekom Indonesia, and many others.

For this LowEndBox special offer we are reviving the discounts from our 2020 Black Friday special and applying it to four different server conigurations! Reprise Hosting is pleased to offer an astounding 30% permanent recurring discount on our RepriseZDED, RepriseZZDED, RepriseEDED and RepriseEEDED dedicated servers. These exceptionally low prices represent the best bargains on self-managed dedicated servers that you’ll find anywhere. Coupon code LOWENDMAR2021 and is limited to the first 15 buyers.”

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!

Black Friday in March!
Reprise ZDED SPECIAL

  • Double memory! Free upgrade to 16GB memory with promo code.
  • Intel Xeon L5640 Six Core CPU (12 threads)
  • 1TB HDD. Free swap to a 240GB SSD upon request during checkout in order comments.
  • 10TB premium multi-homed bandwidth
  • Free upgrade to a 1Gbps port with promo code.
  • 2x usable IP addresses.
  • IPMI: yes
  • Coupon: LOWENDMAR2021 (promo code limited to the first 15 buyers)
  • $27.97/month
  • [ORDER]
